segmentosSRT.text:
You said you wouldn't gamble
if I got pregnant.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Who was gambling? I went to watch.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I'm not your father. I can't be fooled.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Fugui...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I've said all there is to say.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Fugui...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I just wanted to tell you...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: If the baby is a boy...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I won't let him be like you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Granny!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: What do you know?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
Kids had been bullying Fengxia.
He was defending her.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Do you think I'd let this family go to ruin?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I've stuck with you through good and bad.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Have I ever complained?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: In life, you never had a good night's sleep.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: So sleep well now.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Mommy will come see you every day.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Youqing, can you ever forgive me?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I shouldn't have let you go to school.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I should've kept your dad...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: from making you go.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: It's all my fault.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: If only I'd stopped him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I shouldn't have let you go, Youqing!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: The one who ran over my son?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: No one wants your money.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: I want my son. Give me back my son.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: You killed him! Give him back to me!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Go away!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Remember, you owe us a life.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: You killed him. Remember that.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: You killed him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Go away! Now!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: and she can't even join in!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: You brought a bottle.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Very!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: What a clever boy!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02
